meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Normal</kanji> <kanji>discerning</kanji> is the discerning you do on a daily basis, without thinking. It is all the things that you do that are <vocabulary>common sense</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
